summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5878 for the improvement of Garlough Avenue, from Admiral Way to West Wait Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77420, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
